translation.from: Enter your MySpaceIM email and password below and click connect.
translation.to: MySpaceIMのメールとパスワードを以下で入力して、コネクトのボタンをクリックしてください。

translation.from: User not found - please check your spelling.
translation.to: User not found - please check your spelling.
MySpace is no longer accepting logins from this version of the plugin. Please ensure you are running the latest version of Trillian and try again.

Connection to MySpaceIM has failed. You must select a unique nickname for your account before you can use the MySpaceIM service. Click here to be brought to your MySpace home page where you must set your "My URL" setting, then try again.
